alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 4:21PM CDT until May 11 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Tipton County in west Tennessee... Central Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frayser, or 9 miles east of West Memphis, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, West Memphis, Marion, Millington, Covington, Wilson, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Munford, Brighton, Joiner, Sunset, Bassett, Ellendale, Frayser, Midtown Memphis, Dixonville, Downtown Memphis, Tipton and Atoka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
